website_summaries.verdict: Over pumping won't be an issue with this keg pump due to the pressure release vent.
pros: Extremely easy to install and clean between keg parties
Daily usage isn't a problem and one user reported over 2,600 pours with zero issues
cons: Not the highest quality, but for this price point, it works well

customer_reviews.title: Worked great first few times
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for parties and it worked great the first few uses but it soon developed a leak in the mechanism allowing air in after about 4 uses. This made it so that any beer coming out was all foam and you couldn't get a solid flow of beer anymore. I had been cleaning it about every other use up to that point, but I don't see how an air leak could have occurred from lack of cleaning after these few uses. I think there are better longer lasting products on the market but its hard to beat this price
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kane Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a tap!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to tap kegs for penny nights at a little dive bar I help manage. This thing works. It's easy to use. It survives the environment. It cleans easily. I am down with it! We've had great success, and our PBR flows out so freakin' smoothly. UPDATE: Man, it died on us. But it lasted far longer than I really anticipated for the price (damn near a year). What gave out, you ask? I can't be 100% certain, but I want to say a spring on the inside of the plunger gave way. It wouldn't pressure up much more than a single fart's worth. Eh well, was worth it for the time we had it!
customer_reviews.author: Rank Amateur Feelgood Machine

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the tap once so far, but it tapped and poured great! Pressure release valve is a great addition for when the keg gets too pressurized and foamy. Easy to disassemble and clean. Can’t wait to see how it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: scooper

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I needed 5 of these for a big party. At first it was terrible!! then we realized we needed to release some of the pressure and they worked perfect all night long! Very happy with these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: All mine
customer_reviews.text: A good friend of mine had a birthday 🎁 party coming up and I decided to get a keg (1/6 keg 5 gal) lasted all night it was a $40 hold on the pump plus the keg and a bucket. Way to much money so I bought this and I love it and so EASY to use. Having a another party 🎉 plus I’m using it at my wedding 💒
customer_reviews.author: Abril

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to work at an out of town function without testing and it did, straight out of the box. Pretty easy to disassemble and clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent works great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Christmas party. Have had to rent in the past and always have trouble with the rented tap. Glad we bought this one. It ran great pouring perfect beer after perfect beer!
customer_reviews.author: Minerva Noltee

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. I needed a solution for a fridge I converted to hole sixtels and being able to fit the keg and tap required less height. It has a good handle, latches nice, pump well, puts well and is easy enough to clean. How it holds up over time is the real test, I am only 3 kegs in so far. May go up or down a star over time.
customer_reviews.author: Tazman

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: We have an annual party for the Big Game and have always rented taps for the kegs. This year we decided to buy one and this little piece of equipment worked great. It was easy to install, worked wonderfully, and was a snap to clean. I can't speak to durability over time since I've only used it the once, but I can't imagine that we won't be using this for years and years to come. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kessler, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Why pay the beer store $30-40 to rent theirs plus $100 deposit when I can just buy this? It’s easy to use, very good quality, and a great price. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ferrier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pump
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this tap. It’s simple to put on and even easier to use. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality (relief valve), works great, a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ, as well as any manual tap I've ever used. The relief valve is a big upgrade / improvement on conventional taps. Easy to disassemble and clean, appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Man in RVA

customer_reviews.title: This is the tap you need!
customer_reviews.text: THE. BEST. TAP. I've used it over a dozen times already and I've never had a bad tap. Any foam. It did break kinda but I think I fixed it. Pressure release on this is what makes it the best tap out there. If you are hosting any type of party you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tap and why rent one for the for a higher price and pay a cleaning fee. Buying this keg pump saved me allot of money
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barajas

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent tap
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent tap Worked perfectly right out of the box Too bad keg didn’t last long!
customer_reviews.author: James Coltellaro

customer_reviews.title: Great, worth it
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all, used it on 2 kegs with 170 serving on each on with ease!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel Moreno

customer_reviews.title: works as describes
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a party, Was used multiple times, Works as describes
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great tap
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly fine even at 10000 ft in rocky mountains. 2nd time with this tap. First one lasted about 6 years with moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: If you are in need of a keg tap. ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are in need of a keg tap... dont buy and old fashioned keg tap with that old handle pump...make sure that you buy this Bronco pump... you wont regret it....
customer_reviews.author: Doug McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I've use it multiple times already and no issues so far. Make sure to wash it after each use.
customer_reviews.author: BeMerry

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Not as low profile as I was looking for but works great and is good quality! Put it on my spare keg in the spare fridge and provides more options for which kegs I have in my kegerator.
customer_reviews.author: Dave from South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: needed to be readjusted many times in the course of one party and it leaks. Not sure if my product was broken when received because the other reviews seem to have differing experiences but I would steer clear of this pump and get a classic metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump and pour = one person operation
customer_reviews.text: You can pump it with your head as you use your hands to hold a cup and pour.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I used it a couple months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pump broke first time I used it. It was a couple of months later could not get any help to remedy this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dane i.

customer_reviews.title: Best tap for the price
customer_reviews.text: Tap was ready out of the box! Easy to use with accompanying instructions in case you need assistance. Cleaning is very simple as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wonky_Dialup

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: It poured the beer, there was much merriment and epic shenanigans
customer_reviews.author: Peter Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this as a gift for some guys who know how to throw a party.
customer_reviews.text: My buddies over on 15th Street kept havin' to generate that $20-25 tap deposit when they'd go buy their kegs. So I thought I'd help them out by alleviating that cost all together!
customer_reviews.author: arianjalali

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: it did exactly what it was supposed to do, got beer from a keg into my belly. hooray for beer.
customer_reviews.author: Mcginty

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product has excellent quality. It even includes documentation for keg configurations. I've only used it once for a new year's party but it work beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pilet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect party tap
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cheap party tap have not had an issue yet. Sure it's not going to be as durable as the more expensive ones but if you take care of it it'll work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: It Pumps Beer
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it pumps beer quite well. If you need something to do that, then this is definitely the product for you. Delivered promptly right on time and works wonderfully. The pressure release valve is great for getting rid of foam from first tapping and even better for when freshmen over pump the keg. Works better than any other tap we've used so far, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It came quick and was much easieer to use than expected would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Aljay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. even had a release value if you over pump
customer_reviews.author: J. cro

customer_reviews.title: Just works
customer_reviews.text: Not too much to a keg tap unless it doesn't work! This one works and does the job well! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Eli West

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good pour spout lever.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this worked great except for the dispenser. The lever for the pour spout kept breaking off and we had to keep snapping it back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: good product great price
customer_reviews.text: good solid product, quickly delivered, amazing price.. worked well, great to have on hand rather than renting or scrounging to find one at the last minute
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. It fit well in my fridge on a half keg.
customer_reviews.author: george griffith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tapper
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to use! Durable and simple design. Perfect for our 90 person tailgate. I highly recommend for periodic use.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine B. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Decent Enough
customer_reviews.text: Very simple. It's a perfect first tap. Great for parties. The spring comes out sometimes but ours a quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Darhower

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works like is should and durable. Easy to use and great price. Keeps the beer flowing and has a simple pressure release that keeps down the foam.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Hettig

customer_reviews.title: Yummy beer
customer_reviews.text: I loved it it did it's job well at getting the beer out of the keg and into my belly which was a major plus so I highly recommend this pump. Where I'm from the local beer store charges $75 for this exact pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money! We have used it on 3 kegs thus far with plenty of life left in it. The pump has been pushed on by many different users and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Liisa

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have was having a kegger at my house and I went to tap the first keg and the seal was junk and leaked beer out everywhere and hardly pumped! I had to run to the store and get a new one, and being underage made that difficult. Long story short I didn't get my deposit back for those kegs. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zack welter

customer_reviews.title: Broken spring but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We received the tap and saw it's good reviews but its first attempt was for a Halloween party of 70+ people all gathered around the keg. It went on smooth but the hand pump failed to pop up after it was depressed down. 3 of us attempted to do everything using tools and WD-40 to get it to function but no joy. We ended up having a friend bring an old tap that arrived hours later. On the bright side, it sounds like my tap was just broke but the costumer service was excellent, as they took back the pump/refunded my money. Nothing is perfect, maybe this was just the one broke piece that I just happened to get.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Bought several
customer_reviews.text: One of the best taps I have purchased. I use them for parties and did so at my wedding. It does the trick. The only issue is that one of these taps didn’t pressurize right. Finally after a few attempts I let it sit for awhile. Tried again still had the same issue. I switched out the taps and both worked fine. I found it a little odd but there was a solution to my problem. Overall only one not so great experience out of many uses. I would recommend to always have a backup tap regardless the brand or make.
customer_reviews.author: Public name (required)

customer_reviews.title: Great tap for the money and beyond
customer_reviews.text: I bough this due to a keg that would not hook up to my dual tap kegerator (see my other review on the kegerator). I seemed like the sankey was not going down far enough to allow for a flow. I purchased this and two days later it arrived. I hooked it up the the stubborn keg and wallah, a good flow of beer. This keg pump has a very low profile, looks great and works amazingly well! Clean up is even easier, just submerge in water. If you are an avid beer drinker, I highly suggest buying one of these to have on hand "just in case:. You can't go wrong for the money!
customer_reviews.author: EgolfClan

customer_reviews.title: Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I added some keg lube to the rubber gasket before using to help make a seal. After a few hours the pump section became loose and began releasing pressure and would no longer pump beer. This was a simple fix once the problem was identified, twisting at the connection between the metal and plastic. This was probably loose all along and just needed to be tightened before use, this was by no means a defect or flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Hell yeah!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. Can't wait to throw another party just to have an excuse to get trashed, enjoy the company of my friends, and use this great and wonderful tap again. Just be sure to practice good keg party etiquette and clean your tap out afterwards by following the simple instructions included in the box. Party on!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KBD

customer_reviews.title: Not the best tap in the world but far from the worst
customer_reviews.text: Have owned for a couple of years now. It has held up well and continues to work as expected. Not the best tap in the world but far from the worst. I use it for keg parties for about 30-50 people 3-4 times per year. Attaches to keg well and pumps beer fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tararosa Maria Gray

customer_reviews.title: Go ol' school!
customer_reviews.text: The tap worked for about 15-17 beers before it started leaking air from the seals! Unfortunately it couldn't work though the whole party. I am returning this for the ol' reliable steel pump tap.
customer_reviews.author: dannycrawf

customer_reviews.title: It taps beer and is cheaper than a traditional pump
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know how well it charges the beer as I carbonated my keg before use, but it did keep carbonation through the entire BBQ I had it at and didn't foam over except for the first pour after transit.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Manderscheid

customer_reviews.title: ... mistake I ordered wrong pump extremely well-made shipping was super fast package was very good
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back was my mistake I ordered wrong pump extremely well-made shipping was super fast package was very good package
customer_reviews.author: not a domestic goddess

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised. no problems
customer_reviews.text: easy to get going and it just did its job very well. i would most likely just order another one if this one messed up. and the booklet that came with it actually shows all the replacement parts and part numbers to maintain the thing so that is great to file away or keep handy.
customer_reviews.author: frank dye

customer_reviews.title: Shorter push pump has saved the day
customer_reviews.text: It's attached to every keg I have purchased. The shorter push pump has worked great since my friends are careless and have bent or broken previous long pumps. The short pump also makes it better for storage. I do miss hanging the tap around the long piece but the positives of the short pump surely outweigh that college memory.
customer_reviews.author: WKG

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much! Great deal, great product and it came very quickly and was AWESOME! You've totally made my day. I will definitely be back to buy more from you. I highly recommend to anyone and everyone to buy products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rory A Murray

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: The keg pump seemed to work great but the handle broke off after 2 uses. Will be buying from another company next time.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on several legs and works flawlessly MM
customer_reviews.author: Mike McGill

customer_reviews.title: Great pump for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine about six years ago on Amazon brand new. It was $20 to rent one so for $30 I just bought one. I have a Halloween party every year and have used it with success every year. I would buy a nicer one to use all the time, but for my purposes it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Bronco Keg Beer Pump
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. You can't rent a pump for this price. Definitely a good purchase if you have a lot of Keg parties. Have to follow the cleaning instructions immediately after the keg is empty to ensure cleanliness.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Brewer McIsaac

customer_reviews.title: great little tap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tap because I was tired of getting non-working taps from the stores with my kegs. The tap appears solid, easy to install and use, and the pressure release button is quite handy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hovey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy. No durability issues like the other ones with the rods. Definitely a quality product to use! now, only if it came with a CO2 adapter, I'd buy that too!
customer_reviews.author: ActivelyEngagedinLife

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This was great. We obtained it through the mail on a Friday and used Saturday for "The fight" We were very pleased with this product and it gave us no problem, cleaning it was a breeze too. If you are interested in this product, buy it. A.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: EZ to use. Works as well as the more expensive taps and precluded having to pay 90 bucks for a rental and reusable
customer_reviews.author: AeroEng

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Pool Party.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for a company pool-party we hosted with craft beer. Worked well and I have them for next year. Much cheaper than renting.
customer_reviews.author: Rick E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to use. Seems solid and well built for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Marchese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tap! My old one finally gave out, this one is easy to use, store, and clean.
customer_reviews.author: M. Yepez

customer_reviews.title: A heavy drinker that i am. And regretfully Football ...
customer_reviews.text: A heavy drinker that i am. And regretfully Football season is over so i have yet to put this product to proper test.
customer_reviews.author: Quarter

customer_reviews.title: Great tapper!!
customer_reviews.text: This tapper worked great and was very easy to install. The only way this wouldn't work is if you had some moron smash on the top button. Easy pushes were are this item needed. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Keg pump did the job. Has very clear instructions, and worked for our party. It states that you can take it apart to clean it, and I was unable to do so, which is the only reason for the 4/5 star rating. All in all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new keg pump! I'm in the beer industry and always use jockey boxes for the big events but when i have a smaller gig or a party at my house i rely on this great pump! the seal part just below the pump got a little loose after pumping at one event but fixed with a few twists.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAshrafi

customer_reviews.title: not enough pressure horrible the 2 I bought look alike 1 broke I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought used for our wedding, not enough pressure horrible the 2 I bought look alike 1 broke I'm not sure what one
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

product_meta.title: Taprite Keg Pump, D System, Black
product_meta.description: A portable party pump system for single valve kegs. This convenient pump system is compact in size and comes complete with a sturdy metal tapping base, high volume air pump, beer tubing and faucet.
feature_bullets: The Package length of the product is 8.38 inches
The Package width of the product is 14.22 inches
The Package height of the product is 24.64 inches
The Package weight of the product is 1.8 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars261 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
